attributes.additional_details:
If e-petitions are to be an easily usable tool for all then
make it possible to search by the persons name that submitted the petition and by subject and by type of petition.
 Successful petitions that go on to be implimented should be shown and the person(s) submitted them rewarded to encourage more of the same.
A brainstorming web page where ideas can be discussed and improved would be a useful addition.
